mapper.select: SELECT imageUrl, prfnm, prfpdfrom, prfpdto, genrenm, mt20id FROM CONCERT NATURAL JOIN IMAGE WHERE mt10id = #{mt10id} AND sysdate > prfpdfrom AND imageType = 1 AND prfpdto > sysdate

select p.FCLTYNM, p.MT10ID, p.relateurl,p.telno, p.LA, p.LO, DISTNACE_WGS84(#{la}, #{lo}, p.LA, p.LO) as DISTANCE, c.prfnm from PLACE p, concert c where (LA between #{la}-0.019 and #{la}+0.019) and (LO between #{lo}-0.022 and #{lo}+0.022)and p.mt10id=c.mt10id and sysdate > c.prfpdfrom and c.prfpdto > sysdate order by DISTANCE
